DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : JAPAN
DOC.TEXT: Domestic Auto Sales Increase : The Japan Automobile Dealers Assn . said domestic vehicle sales rose 12 % in August from a year earlier to 295 # 283 , the third straight month of gains and the first double-digit gain in four years. " Domestic vehicle sales have entered a real recovery phase . Consumers have begun to buy new cars " to replace cars bought during the economic boom of the late 1980s , said Hiroshi Suemasa , a senior analyst at Kankaku Research Institute Inc. August sales of_imported vehicles soared 70.3 % from a year earlier to 23 # 391 , the 10th straight month of rises , JADA said . Sales of Ford Motor Co . cars rocketed 200 % from a year earlier , industry sources said .
